=Load files=
Screen that manages the loading of music files. 
 * {{{[F1]}}} - Help. 
 * Demos 1, 2 and 3 - Select a demo to load. 
 * Load or {{{[Return]}}} - Loads the selected file.
 * Exit or {{{[Esc]}}} - Returns to the editor.
